job title: Human Resource and Administrative Manager Urgent 2500-3500$ ( from RE, or Bank,MFI sector)
position: Human Resource and Administrative Manager Urgent 2500-3500$ ( from RE, or Bank,MFI sector)

About Us

Grant Thornton Cambodia is an independent member within Grant Thornton International and a wholly foreign-owned company. Grant Thornton’s presence in Cambodia first started in 2004. job title: Plant Engineering and Maintenance Engineer Urgent ( 800-1000$)
position: Plant Engineering and Maintenance Engineer Urgent ( 800-1000$)
Job Description: •	Lead facilities improvement projects; •	Preventive and Breakdown maintenance of plant machines and equipment•	Work with Outsource Contractor and labor for maintenance work.•	Construct the proposed whole year preventive maintenance plan to all PD, QC & WH and significant facility tools and equipment. Ensure preventive maintenance plan is fully effective and consider to update/ change the plan if the plan does not recover/ meet the performance. •	Capability to set up the maintenance room with 5S, safe work place and easily accessible system. Implementing the documented tool recording system for input/ output the tools to concern department.  •	Must be able to provide the training of tool and equipment handling/ using technique and knowledge to protect from potential damaging.•	Troubleshoot mechanical and electrical problems. Supervising at install, repair and maintain piping systems. Experience with large air compressors, building automation systems and fire alarm systems is essential.•	Recording and analyzing the generator fuel usage and brainstorming to reduce the cost and improving the environmental aspect.•	Ability to supervise and differentiate the work significant sectors and performing the job assignment with timetable/ deadline. Practicing the PDCA to meet the deadline and report to superior.•	Good communicate the outsource supplier and overwhelming skills to deal them in order to follow the deadline.•	Lead facilities improvement projects, consisting of scope definition, resource planning, scheduling, implementation, and acceptance, to include coordination of work with vendors/contractors. •	Use problem-solving tools to identify root cause for repetitive breakdowns or other losses. Address key issues and educate peers of problems and solutions. •	The main task of this position to ensure accurate inventory management and efficiently serve the material to production lines•	Machine breakdown & maintenance cost control•	Ensure machine uptime to avoid production loss
Job Requirement: •	Educational certification from a recognized technical institute, preferred.•	Engineering or equivalent in Mechanical or Industrial Engineering•	Analytical Thinking, Innovative or Creative Thinking, Flexibility, and Service Orientation•	knowledge of Assembly line machines & Equipment, Leadership skill, Problem Solving skills, and Service Mindset•	Minimum of 5+ years of maintenance & facility function.  •	Requires the ability to read equipment manuals, HVAC, electrical and plumbing schematics in order to install, maintain and repair electrical and mechanical devices.•	Ability to troubleshoot and resolve equipment malfunctions on chillers, pumps, valves, dehumidifiers, air compressors, VAV boxes, and many other types of devices.  •	Should be proficient in wielding, soldering and brazing.•	Ability to understand interaction of equipment systems and diagnose and repair mechanical, pneumatic and hydraulic problems.  •	Ability to understand interaction of equipment and systems, and diagnose and repair electrical problems.•	Must be knowledgeable of water treatment technologies.  •	Interpret data, identify problems, and formulate proper decisions.•	Express ideas clearly (verbal and written) and ability to work from verbal and written instructions, manuals, wiring diagrams, work orders and specification.•	Ability to generate and analyze reports charts and KPI's dealing with addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division of whole numbers, fractions, and decimals.•	Demonstrated knowledge in the use, maintenance and care of tools, equipment and machinery.•	Demonstrated experience of very strong mechanical ability is required.•	Demonstrated experience of working independently is required.

Job Description:
Purposes of the Position

• Manage electrical team in monitoring & controlling power supply to ensure that operation of all Tenants are smoothly operated.
• To counsel technical support, compromise with civil work in order to avoid any effect to all tenants operation and construction and supervise daily operation activities related to technical work in order to provide service to customers regarding to power supply, water supply and waste water treatment process.

Roles and Responsibilities

• Create electrical drawings in AutoCAD to be included in architectural permit package for City submittal/review including power, lighting, and communication.
• Provide engineering and technical support for internal/external construction trades.
• Conceptualize and design energy efficiency programs for implementation across various facilities components such as lighting, motor controls, power systems, etc.
• Confer with engineers, end users, and project controllers to discuss existing or potential engineering projects/products.
• Design electrical instruments, components, and facilities for commercial and industrial applications.
• Direct and coordinate construction, installation, maintenance, documentation, and testing activities to ensure compliance with specifications, codes, and end user requirements.
• Perform detailed calculations to compute and establish construction and installation standards and specifications.
• Inspect completed installations and observe operations to ensure conformance to design
and equipment specifications, as well as safety standards.
• Develop work scopes with project management and end users for material takeoff and job spec.
• Conduct value engineering functions.
• Support estimating and business development.
• Assist in scheduling and coordination of electrical engineering work with project manager.
• Prepare analysis/report for energy savings programs and value engineering.
• Technical problem resolution.
Job Requirement:
Qualifications and Skills Required

• At least qualified and recognized bachelor degree of electrical engineering.
• Minimum 6 years of experience of electrical work or related fields, preferably in Medium voltage power system.
• Ability to design electrical system and qualified knowledge of control system.
• Good self-determination and leadership.
• Qualified ability to use software applications
• Good negotiation and influencing skill
• Good planning and organization skill
• Strong oral and written communication skill
• Ability to work in flexible shift
• Ability to work in team and cross sections and department
• Good writing and speaking in English.

Relationships

Internal: Supervisor of power distribution is required to collaborate with supervisor and staff
in technical section and have good relationship with other staffs of other departments
to ensure smooth and effective operation and provide satisfactory service to customers.
External: Job holder is also required to closely work with concerning contractors, supplier, technical engineers and service provider in PPSEZ.

Job Description: 1. Implement strategic procurement including sourcing strategy, supplier selection and evaluation, quality management, customer relationship management and performance measurement2. Be responsible for introducing process and policy improvements in the supply chain and procurement department3. Manage relationships with vendors, suppliers and contractors that facilitate smooth flow of services to the company4. Vendor/supplier management and negotiations 5. Provide oversight and risk assessments over contract management processes and ensure transparency6. Determine supplier performance metrics, to provide performance feedback, manage product forecasts or changes7. Ensure effective use of internal Standard Operating Procedures in Procurement and Supply Chain, control of workflows, continuous business processes monitoring and elaboration of improvements in systems and processes8. Oversee and manage IT systems that track shipments, inventory, and the supply of goods.9. Manage the entire process in the planning of procurement and supply chain activities, demand planning, inventory control, logistics, warehouse and distribution, ensuring effective functioning processes to avoid costly delays and lost opportunities10. Implement effective internal control, proper design and functioning of ERP systems 11. Analyze data to inform operational decisions or activities, provide guidance and lead the team to increase inventory turns, reduce waste, or optimize customer service12. Collaborate with other departments to determine process improvements and inventory forecast and control mechanisms to optimize stock level and minimize wastage13. Collaborate with Warehouse Management to improve transportation processes and procedures.14. Prepare weekly, monthly, quarterly and annual procurement and supply chain plans and progress reports as required15. Manage an accurate and up-to-date inventory system across all storage locations and ensure stock takes are performed.
Job Requirement: 1. Rationalize demand plan & drive to a united view of the business2. Evaluate, prioritize, and drive each partner’s supply chain/procurement initiatives (i.e., supplier selection and evaluation, LTO, BOGO, business automation)3. Participate in the coordination of engineering changes, product line extensions, or new product launches to ensure orderly and timely transition in materials or production flow with franchisers 4. Manage operations research or logistic projects 5. Engage with key partners in sales/marketing/business operations to understand the characteristics of the portfolio as well as messaging the challenges in the supply chain area Team management1. Leads the procurement & supply chain team in executing best practices and measuring performance through agreed upon Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).2. Develop and maintain a high-performance culture, resulting in improved levels of customer service to interior and exterior customers.3. Train and evaluate others reporting to the role (e.g. Sourcing/Purchasing, Demand and Supply Planning, Procurement Officers, Central Kitchen and Warehouse Operations).Others:1. Research and evaluate competitors’ procurement process, and their vendors & manufacturers; and provide updates to company’s management for strategic management in keeping potential growthJob Qualifications-Past experience of using an ERP system-Past experience in food & beverage industry.-Past experience in Supply Chain and Procurement functions required. -Past experience using ERP system, proficient in English and Khmer. -Good command in MS Office (Word, excel etc.)

Job Description: DescriptionTo all WordPress enthusiasts! We are looking for an experienced and passionate WordPress Ninja to join our international team! As a WP Developer at Mediapark, you will be responsible for both back-end and front-end development, as well as coaching and mentoring other WordPress pioneers.As WordPress developer, you will:• Write clear, optimized, tested, documented code;• Troubleshoot application and code issues;• Ensuring high-performance and availability, and managing all technical aspects of the CMS• Helping formulate an effective, responsive design and turning it into a working website, theme or plugin.• Work closely with other developers, Project Manager to develop an effective, visually appealing, functional product.

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Namheang  010203922 jobs@smart.com.kh Phnom Penh No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh  010203922

Company Profile: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, IPC is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.

Job Description: KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:Consumer Complaint• To coordinate in the receipt, process and disposal of complaints in accordance with institution's policies and procedures• To monitor and supervise the performance of the Customer Complaint Management Framework• To ensure compliance with Prakas on Resolution of Consumer Complaints and all required reporting requirements to the National Bank of Cambodia• To ensure timely submission of regular reporting related to complaints to Senior Management and the Board of Directors• Act as a touch point for NBC and other Statutory/Regulatory bodies on customer’s complaints/ appeals / requests etc.• Attend to "priority" complaints, assess the issue and collaborate with relevant subject matter experts eg. position: ប្រធានក្រុម ជាងម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង
Job Description:
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារការថែទំា ជួសជុល ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង និងប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើងតាមអគារនីមួយៗ។
• ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ សិក្សានិងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗ ឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
• រៀបចំផែនការណ៍ការងារក្នុងក្រុមធ្វើប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
• រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារនៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ និងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើមកប្រធានផ្នែកផ្ទាល់នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម ( Maintenance Unit) ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណ្ឌភាព។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសហការ ការងារជាមួយជាងខាងក្រៅពេលមានការងារពុំអាចធ្វើបាន ឬបន្ទាន់ច្រើន។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនិងបណ្ណការងារ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការអនុវត្តការងារតាម Check List នៅតាមអគារ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុក និងសម្ភារអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញ ពេលយកទៅប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោងការងារ បើមានការបាត់បង់ ឬមិនបានកត់ត្រាចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍បណ្ណការងារ ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់របាយការណ៍សម្ភារបើកចេញពីស្តុកជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារស្នើសុំបើកសម្ភាររៀងរាល់ចុងខែ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងតាំងពីចាប់ផ្ដើម រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។
• ចូលរួមសហការ ការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
• បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗដែលជួយសម្រួលទៅដល់ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរការបានល្អប្រសើរ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យឃ្លាំងសម្ភារ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ ដើម្បីទិញសម្ភារចូលស្តុកប្រចាំខែ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ ដែលសាលាបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់។

*How to apply:

1. Submit your CV and Cover Letter with a 4x6 Current Photo to our email: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh. Please be noted that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’ and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g., CV_Name.

Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh,Cambodia.

Tel: (855) 12 797 939 (Mon-Fri, 7:30am to 6:00pm.)

Visit our website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: Head of IT and Card Audit Unit
position: Head of IT and Card Audit Unit
Job Description:
** Location: Head Office, Phnom Penh (01 Post).

** Job Summary:
He/she is responsible for examine and evaluating the adequacy and effectiveness of internal control system of the bank, security of IT System, IT Infrastructure, card systems of the bank, and specifically for the Information technology and card system of Head Office as assigned by management of Internal Audit Department. He/she also develops of internal audit procedure and technique to analyze the effectiveness of internal control system of the bank in order to keep the efficiency and effectiveness of audit work.

** Job Description
- Participate in formulating the strategic and annual action plans.
- Prepare audit checklists/working papers, audit program in IT audit scopes and implement after the approval.
- Doing IT risk assessment and prioritize the key risks in IT and General control for each audit period.
- Prepare the audit activity plan and sampling according to the annual audit plan in each audit period before approval from supervisor.
- Prepare the engagement letter of each audit period for supervisor’s final approval.
- Present the engagement letter to the related manager of audit period.
- Lead in discussion with other audit members if having any points in the audit process/interview with related managers.
- Conduct the allocated tasks, auditing analysis, review and draft the reports in effective and efficient manner.
- Do the confirmation with related staff/managers to assure of accuracy in the finding/observation points.
- Do the exit meeting of audit verbal report with related manager after completely verification.
- Facilitate of all questions/issues from branches/
departments in the purpose of doing management response/
feedback on the report.
- Follow up the feedback from branches/departments on specific issues related and in the timeframe.
- Make sure of IT policies and procedures are implemented and complied.
- Make sure of all significant risks in IT are managed and mitigated/protected.
- Ensure that the audit reports show the findings accurately and recommendations are sufficient and appropriate.
- Draft/review the IA report within the given scopes in timely manner and assure of accuracy before sending to supervisor.
- Send the final draft report to direct supervisor in timely basis.

Job Description:
** Location: Head Office, Phnom Penh (02 Posts).

** Job Summary:
To drive commercial loan teams in Head Office to achieve their lending targets through planning and monitoring of overall performance, building of clients base and maintaining of existing client relationships; To provide value-added comments in the Credit Appraisal Report for CCHO and/or CCBOD approval as well as to monitor the loan portfolio to loan quality for the continued profitability of the Bank.

** Job Description
- Facilitate/support Head of Department to propose to develop new commercial loan products, policies and pricing strategies based on market needs to boost and achieve loan targets.
- Drive Unit’s performance through designing work, assigning tasks and continuous performance tracking, coaching and feedback to ensure and maintain high performing team spirit.
- Provide value added comments in the Credit Appraisal Report for CCHO and/or CCBOD approval as well as to monitor the loan portfolio to loan quality and continued profitability of the Bank.
- Prepare pre-deal paper for management consideration prior to submission of formal loan application.
- Filter and facilitate in the presentation of the cases submitted to Credit Committee for final decision with non-prejudiced/merit comment.
- Ensure all commercial loan applications reviewed/prepared/
recommended are fully complied to all ABA policies and procedures with audit recommendations to avoid any reputational or financial risk.
- Coach the team to properly assess creditworthiness of the client for proposing to Credit Committees for approval of the credit proposals.
- Provide commercial lending technical training and other soft skills related to it to equip the team with the right skillsets and mindsets for the role.
- Handle tasks assigned by Line Manager.
- Build client base and maintain the relationships with the client to secure the loan and take it as an opportunity to further cross-sell other banking products.
- Explore business opportunities with corporate clients as well as personal customer, discussing their financial requirements and providing appropriate financial advice and services.
- Process the registration of title deeds at local authority and land office to acquire the legal evidence of clients’ rights to ownership of the property.
- Coordinate loan contracts and arrange loan disbursement timely and accurately to fulfill clients’ needs and satisfaction (for Head Office clients).
- Take time getting to know customers through understanding the rationality of their transactions.
- Deepen client relationship to achieve goals through daily sales activities and occasional sales promotions.
- Conduct market research and data analysis to understand the lending market conditions and update management for any revision needed for existing terms and conditions or policies in order to boost loan growth with highest asset quality.
- Stay abreast of new types of loans and other financial services and products in the market to better meet clients’ needs.
- Act as a role model within the team to question, listen and give actionable feedback carefully in order to create a productive work atmosphere towards “speak up culture”.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in finance and banking, accounting or any relevant field.
- Minimum 5 years of working experiences in business banking or commercial lending function with at least one year in managerial position.
- Sound credit evaluation and analysis skills with extensive business insights related to commercial loans in Cambodia context.
- Sound analytical skills and conceptual risks in regard to commercial lending market in Cambodia.
- Sound financial literacy and ability to interpret and analyze financial statements (audited and/or management reports) of the business in order to access repayment capacity and financial soundness of the clients.
- Sense of judgement and common sense with both qualitative and quantitative tools to provide sound and comprehensive analysis/evaluation on complex credit applications.
- In-depth knowledge of the bank branch operations, rules and regulations, laws, granting loans, and credit risk management.
- Excellent client relationship management, communication, negotiation, problem solving and interpersonal skills.
- Demonstrated leadership & management and ability to motivate and empower team members.
- Presentation skills and professionalism.
- Ability to use and communicate in both Khmer and English and/or other languages.
- Proficient Microsoft Office and Bank’s software.

job title: Head of Compliance and Fraud Systems
position: Head of Compliance and Fraud Systems
Job Description:
** Location: Head Office, Phnom Penh (01 Post).

** Job Summary:
As a Head for compliance and fraud system, you will be responsible to oversee the compliance and fraud department systems functionality, to be in line with ABA standards to achieve the objectives of the Division in terms of system applications. You will ensure all necessary systems of the department are effectively implemented and fulfil the existing requirement as well as gaps identified between the
department.

** Job Description
- Review the technical and business workflow to have it documented and confirmed for existing and new products.
- Manage the testing and coordination with other department on new channel launch UAT and Live Check.
- Manage the delivery of ABA internal CRs and new products by working with involved department staff and developers of Flexcube (FC) / Flextool (FT) / ClickView (CV).
- Manage the delivery of vendor system CRs by working with vendor support teams or product SMEs.
- Support BA compliance and Fraud, Data Analyst, IT Support by coordinating with other Department (scoping, calibration, configuration, change releases, migrations, etc.).
- Track and report jointly with Head of AML and Fraud for all Projects and CRs where both departments are involved.
- Manage the transition between Coral and Alessa for compliance (Migration).
- Follow up on FCM change request (CR) and estimated time of delivery with vendor, and with related stakeholders.
- Track update on Alessa progress and supervise the deployment.
- Plan the launch on Alessa for Fraud by working closely with the Chief compliance officer and Head of Fraud department.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor or master’s degree in IT or project management.
- 3 - 6 years’ experience in Business analysis, IT support, Project management.
- Good knowledge of compliance / fraud environment.
- Good project management and IT skill and ability to effectively manage multiple tasks.
- Strong problem solving and decision-making skill.
- Good understanding of industry's trends and issues.
- Fluent English (writing, speaking, listening).
- Good communication skills and proactivity.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description:
Duties & responsibilities:
• Reconcile invoices and identify discrepancies
• Create and update expense reports
• Matching invoices to purchase orders or vouchers. 
• Process reimbursement forms
• Assisting with the processing of accounts payable and accounts receivable
• Prepare bank deposits
• Enter financial transactions into accounting software (QuickBooks or Peachtree)
• Check petty cash in spreadsheets for accuracy
• Ensure the dividend properly shared according to the company's policies.  
• Coordinate with internal and external auditor to ensure accounting record and accounting report are accurate. 
• Maintain digital and physical financial records
• Issue invoices to customers and external partners, as needed
• Participate in auditing process internally and externally. 
• Other tasks assigned by management.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s in accounting, Finance or relevant field
• At least 3-5 years’ experience in accounting field
• Ability to communicate in English and Chinese is priority
• Knowledge of basic bookkeeping procedures
• Familiarity with finance regulations
• Have strong leadership and high responsibilities
• Good math skills and the ability to spot numerical errors
• Hands-on experience with MS Excel and accounting software (e.g. QuickBooks, Peachtree etc.)
• Organization skills
• Ability to handle sensitive and confidential information
• Be honest and friendly
• Able to work under pressure

Job Description:
Perform daily outlet visits in allocated areas.
- Collect market information and feedback strategies and tactics of competitors.
- Coordinate and effectively deploy the Beer Promoters in assigned outlets.
- Build close relationships with Beer Promoters and act as a confidant.
- Conduct checks on Beer Promoters attendance and ensure punctuality of deployment.
- Conduct briefings and meetings with Beer Promoters regularly.
- Coach and guide Beer Promoters on product knowledge and services.
- Monitor outlets and evaluate Beer Promoters’ sales performance, submit reports on a
regular basis.
- Manage daily administration work for Beer Promoters.
- Develop solid and long-term influential relationships with all outlets in assigned territory.
- Perform related duties as assigned from time to time as required by the company.

- High School Diploma/ Degree in Business Studies or related field.
- At least 2 - 4 years of experience in the successful management of a Promoter team.
- Able to collaborate and build relationships across all levels internally and externally.
- Excellent communicator and good interpersonal skills, able to handle difficult business situations and negotiate well.
- Ability to lead, guide and coach a team of Promoters.
- Knowledge of advertising and sales promotion techniques.
- Ability to demonstrate energy, sense of urgency, focus and follow-through.
- Required to maintain a professional appearance and provide a positive company
image to the public. Honest and with integrity.
- Willingness to work a flexible schedule with night market visits.
- Good command of English, written and spoken; and computer literate.

job title: មន្រ្តីប្រមូលបំណុល
position: មន្រ្តីប្រមូលបំណុល
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
មន្រ្តីប្រមូលបំណុលនឹងទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះរាល់បំណុលទាំងអស់ ឬការទូទាត់យឺតយ៉ាវពីអតិថិជនដោយចាត់វិធានការយ៉ាងឆាប់រហ័សក្នុងការរកដំណោះស្រាយ និងពិនិត្យមើលឫសគល់នៃបញ្ហា។ គាត់នឹងធ្វើការជូនដំណឹងដោយផ្ទាល់ទៅកាន់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែក និងប្រធានផ្នែកផងដែរ។

• ធានាថាលទ្ធផលនៃការប្រមូលបំណុលរបស់ក្រុមនីមួយៗ គឺសំរេចបានដល់មូលដ្ឋាន KPI
• ធានាថាមានការយល់ដឹងឱ្យបានល្អទៅលើការត្រួតពិនិត្យ ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ទិន្នន័យ ការទូទាត់ប្រាក់សំណង និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗ
• រៀបចំផែនការនៃការចុះទៅដល់អាស្រ័យដ្ឋាន ឬទីតាំងរបស់អតិថិជនប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ដើម្បីប្រមូលសាច់ប្រាក់ ដកហូតមកវិញនៅឧបករណ៏ប្រើប្រាស់ ដូចជា ម៉ូតូ…
• កត់ត្រារាល់សកម្មភាពការងារ ទៅក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធប្រមូលដោយទៀងពេល និងត្រឹមត្រូវ
• ចរចារច្បាស់លាស់ជាមួយការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងខ្ពស់ ដើម្បីប្រមូលសាច់ប្រាក់ ដកហូតមកវិញពីអតិថិជន
• គ្រប់គ្រង និងត្រួតពិនិត្យយ៉ាងម៉ត់ចត់នូវ “ការងារត្រូវធ្វើ-បញ្ជី” និងពិនិត្យមើលអតិថិជនដែលមិនបានបង់ប្រាក់ដើម្បីរកឱ្យឃើញនូវដំណោះស្រាយណាមួយ
• តាមដានរាល់របាយការណ៍លទ្ធផលប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍និងប្រចាំខែ រួមប្រជុំជាមួយប្រធាន។
• កសាងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាន ដើម្បីរកដំណោះស្រាយ និងចាត់វិធានការល្អបំផុតចំពោះ អតិថិជន
• រឹបអូសយកទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិពីអតិថិជនដែលមិនមានលទ្ធភាពក្នុងការសង ឬទូទាត់
• រាយការណ៍ពីករណីសង្ស័យណាដែលថាជាករណីបន្លំលើការសងប្រាក់
• សហការ និងគាំទ្រក្រុមការងារជាក្រុមដើម្បីបង្កើនការលទ្ធផលប្រមូល
• ជាមនុស្សដែលផ្តោតលើលទ្ធផល ការតំរង់ទិស និងការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ក្នុងការកែលំអអភិវឌ្ឍខ្លួន
• អនុវត្តមុខងារផ្សេងទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង / ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement:
• កំពុង ឬបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុធនាគារ ឬជំនាញពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗទៀត
• មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច ១ ឆ្នាំក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបំណុល ឬការប្រមូលប្រាក់កម្ចី

• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ គោរពម៉ោងការងារ សហការជាក្រុម និងជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ

Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Field Collection Supervisor will be mostly responsible for all overall Loan Recovery Management of the Company. He/she will be responsible for the management and implementation of the loan recovery department and find out a good strategy as well as solution technique to recover all our Company Asset and Profits.

• Overall manage and lead SFCO/FCO to perform well and comply with company policy/procedure.
• Ensure each FCO/Team’s Collection Result are improved/achieved base on KPI set.
• Work with efficiency, quality and accountability to reach the highest productivity.
• Allocate lessee to SFCO/FCO in Collection System base to balancing/fair/zone.
• Push/motivate staff to improve on Cash Collecting/Asset Repossession.
• Arrange/Facilitate/Review Daily Visitation Plan for staff in order to improve team/staff result.
• Ensure the calling/visiting record by each staff are on time and accuracy in Collection System.
• Negotiates and find best ways to support staff with seriously lessee or influent person.
• Daily manage and control the “Unpaid” and review those lessee’s situation from each team.
• Train, guide, lead, coach staff relevant policies, procedures, guidelines, Memo and some skills to improve the negotiation/communication with lessees.
• Prepare, manage and monitor the daily, weekly and monthly collection report/action.
• Assign staff to support teamwork on field visiting to improve staff who low performance.
• Be “Problem Solver” to solve on staff problem/lessee complaint.
• Be model to staff on how to reach KPI, and orient staff to be great staff in team.
• Shall be visited lessee’s location especially lessee’s Office and Hometown to support team.
• Verify visiting result to ensure staff have visited to lessee house, Office, Other places accordingly and take proper action to staff who missed/careless on their responsibility.
• Keep good relationship with all staff/stakeholder in company and local authorities.
• Collaborate with other Supervisor on serious case of lessee until get full payment/recovered.
• Report any suspicious cases that suspected as fraud case on repayment to Collection Manager.
• Analyze on Collection Result on poor performance staff/team and find the way to improve.
• Conduct weekly meeting with team to share information and find the way to make improvement. 
• Spot Check, identify, analyze to staff/lessee situation and find root course to take action on time. 
• Performs other duties as assigned by Management.
Job Requirement:
•	Relevant Bachelor’s degree, Master degree is a plus 
•	At least 4 years of experience in Loan Recovery and Collection Management (experience at a financial institution is an advantage)
•	Self-starter
•	Good and Strong strategic problem solving 
•	Strong team building and honest 
•	Good situation analysis and communication skills
•	Mature disposition with good interpersonal skills
•	Good oral, written communication and presentation skills
•	Good English proficiency, both written and spoken

job title: មន្រ្តីផ្នែកលក់
position: មន្រ្តីផ្នែកលក់
Job Description:
** ABOUT THE ROLE
មន្រ្តីផ្នែកលក់នឹងទទួលខុសត្រូវដោយផ្ទាល់ចំពោះរាល់ទម្រង់ពាក្យស្នើសុំទាំងអស់ពីអតិថិជនដោយរៀបចំទុកដាក់ ទំនាក់ទំនង ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងជួយសម្រួលក៏ដូចជាពាក់ព័ន្ធជាមួយមន្រ្តីផ្នែកអង្កេត។ គាត់នឹងធ្វើការជូនដំណឹងដោយផ្ទាល់ទៅកាន់ប្រធានផ្នែក និងប្រធានសាខាផងដែរ។

• ទទួលស្វាគមន៍និងបម្រើអតិថិជនដោយក្រមសីលធម៌ជាមួយសេវាកម្មរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
• ផ្តល់ និងផ្សព្វផ្សាយរាល់ផលិតផលព័ត៌មាន និងសេវាកម្មរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនដល់អតិថិជនដោយច្បាស់លាស់ និងប្រកបដោយភាពស្មោះត្រង់
• ប្រមូល និងរៀបចំឯកសារចាំបាច់ទាំងអស់ពីអតិថិជន
• សហការ និងជួយមន្រ្តីផ្នែកអង្កេត ដើម្បីប្រមូលឯកសារបន្ថែមពីអតិថិជន និងអ្នកធានា
• ពិនិត្យ និងធ្វើឱ្យប្រាកដថាលក្ខណៈវិនិច្ឆ័យឥណទានទាំងអស់របស់អតិថិជន និងអ្នកធានាត្រូវបានរៀបចំយ៉ាងពេញលេញ
• ត្រួតពិនិត្រ និងបញ្ចប់រាល់សាវតារបស់អតិថិជនព័ត៌មានឥណទានបនា្ទប់ពីប្រមូលដោយមន្រ្តីផ្នែកអង្កេត
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ សប្តាហ៍និងប្រចាំខែជូនអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
• អនុវត្តមុខងារផ្សេងទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement:
• កំពុង ឬបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុធនាគារ ឬជំនាញពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗទៀត
• ការយល់ដឹងនៅក្នុងវិស័យគ្រឹះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ធនាគារ ឬក្រុមហ៊ុនភតិសន្យា
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ គោរពម៉ោងការងារ សហការជាក្រុម និងជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ
• អក្ខរកម្មកុំព្យូទ័រ ដូចជា Word, Excel, PowerPoint, ការចូលប្រើប្រាស់អ៊ីនធឺណិត និងអ៊ីម៉ែល
• បេក្ខនារី គឺលើកទឹកចិត្តយ៉ាងខ្លាំងក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យបម្រើការងារ។

Company Profile: Prime MF Microfinance Institution Ltd. is a licensed microfinance institution with a mission to provide financial services to individuals and groups in Cambodian communities to help them liberate from unprivileged status.  The MFI was registered with the Ministry of Commerce in August 2010 as a financial service provider and obtained a microfinance institution license from the National Bank of Cambodia (NBC) in December 2010. To ensure access to financial services for communities in broader areas, Prime MF has opened its new branch every year since 2013 and recently opened 7th branch in Kampong Speu Province in December 2019. Prime MF is a well-known provider of microfinance service in Phnom Penh with its flexible and speedy process. With a strong operation team and management, Prime MF is one of the fastest growing micro financial institute in Phnom Penh. It has fulfilled its commitment by increasing loan portfolio with affordable products and quality financial performance.

position: ជាងតោន និងបាញ់ថ្នាំឡាន
Job Description:
• ទទួលផែនការពីប្រធានផ្នែកអំពីការងារដែលត្រូវជួលជុល
• ផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានទៅប្រធានផ្នែកពីគុណភាពគ្រឿង
• របាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្នែកវិញនូវចំនុចដែលខូចខាត ដើម្បីពិភាក្សាជួសជុល ឬផ្លាស់ប្តូរ
• ដាក់លិខិតស្នើសុំទៅកាន់ផ្នែកឃ្លាំងតាមរយៈប្រធានផ្នែកដើម្បីស្នើសុំសម្ភារៈ
• ការជួសជុលត្រូវផ្តោតទៅលើពេលវេលា គុណភាព សោភណ្ឌភាព និងសុវត្ថិភាពខ្ពស់
• សរុបរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្នែកនូវសកម្មភាពពេលបញ្ចប់ការជួសជុល
• សំអាតបរិវេណ និងរថយន្ត ឱ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ពេលបញ្ចប់ការជួសជុល
• ត្រូវជួយការងារដល់ជាងដទៃទៀតនៅពេលដែលមិនទាន់ទទួលបានផែនការពីប្រធានផ្នែក
• ត្រូវបញ្ចប់ការងារដែលខ្លួនបានធ្វើទោះបីជាដល់ម៉ោងចេញក៏ដោយ
• អាចមកធ្វើការថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រសិនជាមានការស្នើសុំពីប្រធានផ្នែក
• បាញ់ថ្នាំឡានគ្រប់ប្រភេទ
• បាញ់ថ្នាំលើទ្វាររ៉ូត
• លាយថ្នាំបាញ់ឱ្យស៊ីពណ៌សាច់ឡាន
• បៀកកាវឱ្យស្មើរសាច់ដែក
• ខាតកាវបៀកឱ្យស្មើរសាច់ដែក
• ឆាបដែកឱ្យស្មើរគ្នា
• សម្អាតតួរថយន្តឱ្យស្អាតមុន និងបាញ់ថ្នាំ ឬបាញ់ស្លាកសញ្ញា
• បិទក្រដាសកាសែតកន្លែងដែលមិនត្រូវបាញ់ថ្នាំ កុំឱ្យសាចថ្នាំប្រឡាក់
• សហការជាមួយលេខាធិការយានដ្ឋាន អំពីតម្រូវការ ការស្ទីកគ័របាញ់ថ្នាំ
• បាញ់ថ្នាំយ៉ាន់ និងតាបួររថយន្ត
• តោនឱ្យស្មើរសាច់ដែក និងភ្លី
• ប្តូរមេឡានពុក
• តោន បាត សាច់ជញ្ជាំង ដំបូល និង ទ្វាររថយន្ត
• រៀបចំលួសទុកសម្រាប់ផ្សា
• កាត់ដំបូលក្បាលឡាន ទុកសម្រាប់ប៉ះកន្លែងខូចខាតរបស់រថយន្ត
• រៀបចំផ្លាស់ប្តូរ ថ្មស្អុយ និងអុកស៊ីសែន
• រៀបចំកៅស៊ូមេ ប្រឡុង ខ្ចៅ វីស
• លាបឡាំងកូតបាតរថយន្ត
• បិទស្ទីកគ័រលើឡាន កញ្ចក់ ដែក ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង ការ៉ូ
• រៀបចំដែកកេះ ស្កុតក្រដាស កំបិតតូច ធំ
• រៀបចំបិទស្ទីកគ័រកាត់រូបភាព អក្សរ និងក្រដាសគំរូត្រូវបិទ
• រៀបចំក្រណាត់ទុកជូត
Job Requirement:
• ធ្លាក់ ឬជាប់ថ្នាក់ទី12
• មានអាយុចាប់ពី 18 ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
• បទពិសោធន៍ការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការងារបើកបរ យ៉ាងហោចណាស់ 1 ឆ្នាំ
• អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់
• មានការព្យាយាម ភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ និងការលះបង់ខ្ពស់
• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
• មានចំណេះដឹងក្នុងការដឹកនាំក្រុម ចេះនិយាយ ចេះសរសេរអក្សរខ្មែរបាន

Company Profile:
Legal Support for Children and Women (LSCW) is non-governmental organization (NGO). Founded
and registered with the Ministry of Interior (MoI) in 2002, LSCW was established to contribute to the
development of the rule of law, to promote access to justice and to protect human rights, including the
rights of migrants.
Under finance support from the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade fund-ASEAN-Australian
Counter-Trafficking, LSCW is implementing the “Enhancing Legal Aid and Support Services for
Victims of Human Trafficking (ELASS)” project. The project aims to contribute to the elimination of
human trafficking and exploitation by enhancing access to Legal aid and services support for Cambodian
victims of crimes.

Job Description:
JOB SUMMARY:

This role is responsible for overseeing the Customer Services area and counter activities at the branch to ensure the service quality and customer satisfaction as well as good customer experience, conducting on the job coaching and mentoring to all Customer Service Officers and Tellers to ensure they perform according to the policies and procedures and taking care of the branch cleanliness to ensure sanity as well as security guards to ensure security at the branch.


JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: 


•	Oversee and assess customer service staff activities at the branch to ensure the smoothness and service experience to all types of customers
•	Participate in the development of Customer Services strategies to make sure the quality and satisfaction of the service
•	Conduct cross-sell with existing and new customers especially toward deposit products to support the monthly target at the branch level
•	Execute the direct supervision over Customer Service Officer (CSO) to ensure they are able to perform the job following service standard policies and procedures
•	Review, verify and advise CSO account opening applications both hard copy and in the system to make sure they are all complied with service and system policies and procedures
•	Conduct on-the-job coaching and development and performance-related feedback over customer services and sales skills to all CSOs to make sure they have enough capacity to perform the role
•	Conduct daily monitoring and evaluation of accounts opening and sales volume to ensure quality and target achieved
•	Manage tasks and lead counter staff to ensure they are well prepared, smooth workflow, good communication, be ready for providing service, and all coming clients are promptly served
•	Manage and enforce the implementation of customer relationships in the purpose of cross-selling in order to support branch yearly target
•	Authorize in the system on cash and credit transactions in compliance with policies and procedures to ensure transactions are timely and accurately processed
•	Service and cash counter controlling both physical and environment in order to be ready for daily operations
•	Other tasks assigned by BM following business needs
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENT:

•	Bachelor’s degree in finance, accounting, or other relevant fields
•	Have experience, not exceeding 5 years in a similar role.
•	Have experiences and/or understanding in customer centricity, agile delivery, etc.
•	Ability to process cash transactions accurately and efficiently.
•	Computer skills in Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.
•	Good command of spoken and written English is required.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
** JOB DESCRIPTION
Working together with the Head of Enrichment and Professional Learning, Singapore (Cambodia) International Academy Co., Ltd. (SCIA), a Cambodia registered subsidiary of SIM International Pte. Ltd., The Programme Instructor, High School Math, is responsible for the following areas:

** JOB PURPOSE:
- Instruct students in subject-specific bridging programme
- Create lesson plans and learning activities based on Singapore & Cambridge International Curriculum
- Evaluate student performance using different methods such as observation, performance-based tasks or other standard test practices; prepare evaluation report at the end of the programme
- Teach using lectures, technology and hands-on experiences
- Perform other functions as necessary or assigned 
- Assist in any projects or tasks in relation to company goals and objectives
- Communicating with parents regarding student progress and behaviours periodically
- Deployed to outreach events
- Supporting ENR & PFL division, when necessary
Job Requirement:
1. Academic Education / Training / Experience
- Understand the Singapore education system and Cambridge curriculum
- Able to assist in developing worksheets relevant to subjects
- Good communication and critical thinking skills
- Adaptable and resilient

2. Personal Attributes 
- A passion for education sector and working with children
- Willing to be stationed in Phnom Penh, Cambodia
- Willing to work flexibly in dynamic and fast-paced environment
- Excellent interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
- Strong ability in leadership, networking, teamwork, and problem-solving
- Meticulous, analytical and self-driven
- Ability to think strategically
- Ability to work independently, as well as in collaboration with others
- Ability to “think outside the box” in identifying problems and implementing solutions
- Works well under pressure, well organised and with strong attention to details
- Ability to multitask and manage tight deadlines
Company Profile: At SCIA, we are committed to providing a holistic education for lifelong learners. Our K12 school offers the unique blend of Cambridge & Singapore curricula for 2-18 years old. We also offer an exciting range of programmes through our enrichment hub - Play Network. From performing arts to STEM, sports to clubs and societies, we have something to cater to every interest. Recognising the importance of nurturing future leaders in Cambodia, SCIA offers the following programmes to cater to the different needs of learners:- Early Childhood Education- Primary Education- Secondary Education- Pre-University EducationOur Education and Career Guidance (ECG) team will support students in making informed decisions about their future, helping them to transition smoothly from school to further education or participate in our courses and international learning journeys.

Job Description:
JOB SUMMARY:

Officer, Regulatory Compliance will work under the leadership of the Head of Compliance is to ensure effective administration of the CMBC’s compliance program with particular focus on regulatory compliance; specifically, this position will focus on assisting in the development, administration, monitoring, evaluating, and testing of the regulatory compliance program in all areas were relevant to the banking industry.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: 

•	Assist in developing and administrating the regulatory compliance program in all areas were relevant to the banking industry.
•	Advice on relevant regulatory requirements to respective business and support departments
•	Assist in monitoring, testing, and evaluating the regulatory compliance program to ensure effectiveness and permanent compliance.
•	Obtain and understand regulatory updates from relevant authorities, validate its applicability to different units, and ensure timely dissemination to the concerned.
•	Perform gap analysis on all applicable regulatory issuances, define actions to be taken and the timeline for compliance.
•	Coordinate with business units in the preparation of the accurate and timely submission of all regulatory reports.
•	Assist to review and advise on all CMCB’s frameworks, policies, and procedures to ensure that all regulatory requirements are incorporated.
•	Maintain compliance awareness by conducting periodic training to all respective employees on related regulatory requirements.
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENT:

•	Bachelor’s degree in law / CAT / Finance and Accounting
•	Experience in Compliance field in Banking, Insurance Company… etc.
•	Understand about Compliance landscape
•	Time management skill
•	Project management skill
•	Inter-personal skill
•	Ability to be flexible
•	Ability to work in isolate and teamwork
•	Actively respond to multi-tasks
•	Passion to work in a rapid growth environment
•	Possess well-understanding of laws and regulations to the banking industry

Job Description:
* Job Scope:			

An exceptional and hands-on designer creates blueprints for our clients. The designer will be required to consider the intended purposes of each design area, along with clients' style preferences, when drafting such plans. You should also ensure adherence to stipulated building and safety codes during each phase of the project.

* Job Responsibilities:
• Meeting with clients to ascertain the intended functions and appearance of each space
• Anticipating and informing clients of additional features which may be of use to them
• Giving careful consideration to the placement of water and electrical systems to ensure safety
• Creating a plan which details the layout and appearance of all installations and loose furniture
• Suggesting appropriate materials and finishes
• Assisting clients to select and supervise the work of independent contractors, so that their duties are conducted in accordance with clients' visions
• Observing prescribed building and safety regulations 
• Other tasks as assigned by immediate supervisor
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor's degree in interior design or related field
• Proficient English user, both written and spoken
• Portfolio of design work
• Project management experience
• Experience with computational design
• Highly creative, imaginative and artistic
• Excellent communication skills, especially in regard to communicating an artistic vision
• Proficiency in AutoCAD, Illustrator, SketchUp or similar design software

* Job Benefits:

• Health and accident insurance
• Annual leave and other Leave entitlement
• Meal and other allowances
• Public Holidays 
• Annual staff party and other staff gathering events
• Training opportunities
• And other benefits


* To apply, please submit your CV and Cover Letter to email hr@dh3group.com 
- For more information, please contact 092 670 270 / 093 670 270.
